## Describe the bug

A clear, short description of what went wrong.

## To reproduce

1. How you run Fixpoint (GitHub Action / webhook / CLI)
2. What you did (e.g. opened a PR with vulnerable code)
3. What you expected
4. What actually happened

## Environment

- **How you use Fixpoint:** GitHub Action / self-hosted webhook / CLI
- **OS:** (e.g. Ubuntu 22.04, Windows, macOS)
- **Python version:** (if CLI/webhook)
- **Fixpoint version/tag:** (e.g. v1, IWEBai/fixpoint@v1)

## Logs or screenshots

If you have logs (e.g. from Actions or the webhook server) or a screenshot, paste or attach them.

## Additional context

Any other details that might help (repo is private, custom rules, etc.).
